issue.title: rotations in ray sensor pose turns into weird translations and behaviour

content.raw:
Sorry for the late reply.

Unfortunately, this patch does not solve the issue for me. The ray sensor is still not aligned with the link it is referenced with and I am unable to rotate it with either rotating the link in the urdf nor by using the <pose> tag in the SDF part.

Am I doing sth wrong?

PS: I used a fresh compile with the default branch as of today.
content.html:
Sorry for the late reply.

Unfortunately, this patch does not solve the issue for me. The ray sensor is still not aligned with the link it is referenced with and I am unable to rotate it with either rotating the link in the urdf nor by using the <pose> tag in the SDF part.

Am I doing sth wrong?
